verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:4
verses.text: Nevertheless the king’s word prevailed against Joab. Wherefore Joab departed, and went throughout all Israel, and came to Jerusalem.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:5
verses.text: And Joab gave the sum of the number of the people unto David. And all they of Israel were a thousand thousand and an hundred thousand men that drew sword: and Judah was four hundred threescore and ten thousand men that drew sword.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:6
verses.text: But Levi and Benjamin counted he not among them: for the king’s word was abominable to Joab.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 21:7
verses.text: And God was displeased with this thing; therefore he smote Israel.
